text: Cyberpunks is a top down shooter game for the Amiga developed by Mutation and published by Core Design in 1993. The player controls three characters simultaneously. Game play consists of shooting enemy aliens and locating several door passes before being able to move onto the next level ==References== ==External links== * at MobyGames * at GameSpot Category:1993 video games Category:Amiga games Category:Amiga-only games Category:Shoot 'em ups Category:Single-player video games Category:Top-down video games Category:Video games developed in the United Kingdom
title: Cyberpunks (video game)
